title: Advanced Button - Usage Examples
description: Comprehensive usage patterns for the advanced button block with extensive styling, hover effects, icons, and animation options.

examples.name: Primary CTA Button - Style 1
examples.description: Standard call-to-action button with icon, centered alignment, purple background
examples.visualDescription: Purple (#667eea) button with white text 'Get Started'. Right arrow icon after text. Hover: darkens to #5568d3. Rounded corners (6px). Center-aligned. 15px padding top/bottom, 30px left/right.
examples.useCase: Primary CTAs, hero sections, sign-up buttons, main actions

examples.name: Secondary Button with Outline - Style 2
examples.description: Outline/ghost button style with transparent background and border
examples.visualDescription: Transparent background with 2px purple border. Purple text. Hover: fills with purple background, white text. Left-aligned. Icon before text (chevron-right).
examples.useCase: Secondary actions, less prominent CTAs, alternative choices

examples.name: Button with Hover Text Change - Style 7
examples.description: Button text changes on hover to reveal alternate message
examples.visualDescription: Initially shows 'Download Now'. On hover, text slides left and changes to 'Get Free PDF'. Blue background (#3b82f6). White text. Download icon stays visible.
examples.useCase: Interactive CTAs, engaging hover effects, download buttons, creative marketing

examples.name: Video Popup Button with FancyBox - Style 1
examples.description: Button that opens video in lightbox overlay (FancyBox)
examples.visualDescription: Red background (#ef4444) button with 'Watch Video' text. White play icon before text. Hover: shadow expands. Clicking opens YouTube video in lightbox overlay.
examples.useCase: Video CTAs, demo presentations, tutorial introductions, media galleries

examples.name: Icon-Only Button - Style 1
examples.description: Circular button with icon only, no text
examples.visualDescription: Small circular button (50x50px) with white shopping cart icon on green background. Hover: rotates 15deg. Right-aligned. Perfect for floating action buttons.
examples.useCase: Icon-only actions, floating buttons, compact CTAs, mobile-friendly interactions

examples.name: Button with Custom Image Icon - Style 1
examples.description: Button using custom uploaded image as icon instead of Font Awesome
examples.visualDescription: White button with logo image (32x32px) before text. Logo is custom brand icon. Text 'Our Platform' in dark gray. Hover: background changes to light purple. Left-aligned.
examples.useCase: Branded buttons, custom icons, product-specific CTAs, unique branding

examples.name: Vertical Icon Above Text - Style 1
examples.description: Button with icon positioned vertically above text (stacked layout)
examples.visualDescription: Large button with star icon (32px) centered above 'Rate Us' text. Both icon and text stack vertically. Light blue background. Hover: icon animates from top. Center-aligned.
examples.useCase: Feature cards, action tiles, mobile app-style buttons, large touch targets

examples.name: Multi-State Button - Style 3
examples.description: Advanced button style with multiple hover states and transitions
examples.visualDescription: Gradient background (purple to pink). White text 'Join Now'. Hover: gradient animates in reverse direction. Smooth 300ms transition. Icon fades in from left on hover. Center-aligned.
examples.useCase: Premium CTAs, attention-grabbing actions, modern designs, landing pages

examples.name: External Link Button with nofollow - Style 1
examples.description: Button for external links with SEO nofollow attribute
examples.visualDescription: Gray button with external link icon. Text 'Visit Partner Site' with small external-link icon after. Opens in new tab. nofollow for SEO. Right-aligned.
examples.useCase: Affiliate links, external resources, partner links, third-party sites

attributes.ariaLabel: Visit partner website (opens in new tab)

examples.name: Full-Width Mobile Button - Style 1
examples.description: Button that becomes full-width on mobile devices for better touch targets
examples.visualDescription: Desktop: Standard width, left-aligned. Tablet: Same. Mobile: Expands to full width (100%), center text. Green background. Phone icon before 'Call Now' text. Large touch target.
examples.useCase: Mobile CTAs, call-to-action buttons, contact forms, responsive designs

validationRules.block_id: Required. Unique identifier for the block.
validationRules.styleType: Button visual style. Values: 'style-1' through 'style-9'. Each has unique hover/animation behavior. Default: 'style-1'.
validationRules.btnText: Button text content. Can be empty for icon-only buttons. Default: 'Buy Now'.
validationRules.btnLink: Required link object with url, target ('_self', '_blank'), nofollow ('', 'nofollow') properties.
validationRules.iconType: Icon source. Values: 'fontAwesome' (icon font), 'image' (uploaded image). Default: 'fontAwesome'.
validationRules.fontAwesomeIcon: Font Awesome class string (e.g., 'fa fa-arrow-right'). Requires iconType: 'fontAwesome'.
validationRules.imageName: Uploaded image object with id and url. Requires iconType: 'image'.
validationRules.imageSize: WordPress image size (thumbnail, medium, large, full). For iconType: 'image'. Default: 'full'.
validationRules.iconPosition: Icon placement relative to text. Values: 'iconBefore', 'iconAfter'. Default: 'iconAfter'.
validationRules.icnVrtcal: Vertical icon stacking. Values: 'icon-top' (icon above text), '' (horizontal). Default: ''.
validationRules.iconSpace: Space between icon and text. Responsive. Recommended: 8-12px.
validationRules.iconSize: Icon size. Responsive. For fontAwesome: font-size. For image: width/height. Recommended: 14-24px.
validationRules.hoverText: Alternate text shown on hover. Only for style-7. Button text changes to this on hover.
validationRules.fancyBox: Open link in lightbox overlay. Boolean. Use for YouTube/Vimeo videos or images. Default: false.
validationRules.ariaLabel: Accessibility label for screen readers. Highly recommended for all buttons, required for icon-only buttons.
validationRules.templates: Template ID for backend preview. Generally leave empty unless using block templates.
validationRules.backendVisi: Backend visibility toggle. Boolean. For editor-only preview. Default: false.

warnings: CRITICAL: Never modify or regenerate block_id - causes blocks to break.
Icon-only buttons (empty btnText) MUST have ariaLabel for accessibility (screen readers need text).
fancyBox only works with YouTube, Vimeo, image URLs, or valid media. Regular links won't open in popup.
hoverText only works with styleType: 'style-7'. Other styles ignore this attribute.
iconType: 'image' requires imageName object with valid WordPress media ID and URL.
styleType determines available hover animations. Not all btnHvrType work with all styles.
icnVrtcal: 'icon-top' stacks icon above text. Ensure iconSpace is set for proper spacing (not margin-right).
target: '_blank' (new tab) should include nofollow: 'nofollow' for external/affiliate links (SEO).
btnLink.url is required. Empty URL results in non-functional button.
Font Awesome icon classes must include 'fa' prefix: 'fa fa-icon-name' not just 'fa-icon-name'.
Multiple buttons in same container may need Alignment adjustment to avoid layout issues.
Very long btnText (>20 characters) may wrap on mobile. Test on small screens.
Custom image icons should be square aspect ratio for best appearance (e.g., 64x64px).
commonMistakes: Forgetting ariaLabel on icon-only buttons (empty btnText) - fails accessibility
Using fancyBox: true with non-media URLs (regular page links don't open in popup)
Setting hoverText on styleType != 'style-7' (no effect, ignored)
Using iconType: 'image' without providing imageName object (icon doesn't appear)
Forgetting to set iconSpace (icon smashes against text, no spacing)
Setting target: '_blank' without nofollow on affiliate/external links (SEO issue)
Using very large iconSize (>50px) with small text (disproportionate, ugly)
Setting icnVrtcal: 'icon-top' but iconSpace only sets margin-right (spacing broken)
Using non-existent Font Awesome icon classes (icon shows as square/missing glyph)
Setting btnText but wanting icon-only (set btnText: '' for icon-only buttons)
Forgetting responsive Alignment (looks fine on desktop, broken on mobile)
Using styleType values outside 'style-1' through 'style-9' (defaults to style-1)
Setting both iconBefore and iconAfter in same button (pick one, iconPosition is single value)
bestPractices: Always provide ariaLabel for accessibility, especially on icon-only buttons
Icon spacing: 8-12px provides comfortable balance between icon and text
Icon size: 14-18px for inline buttons, 24-32px for large hero buttons, 40-50px for icon-only
For external links: use target: '_blank' AND nofollow: 'nofollow' for SEO
Use center alignment (md: 'center') for primary CTAs in hero sections
Use left alignment for secondary actions and in-content buttons
Icon position: iconAfter for forward actions (Next, Submit), iconBefore for back/download
For videos: use fancyBox: true with YouTube/Vimeo URLs for inline video popup
Responsive alignment: center on mobile (xs: 'center'), left/right on desktop
Phone/email links: use tel: and mailto: protocols (e.g., 'tel:+1234567890')
Test hover effects on actual devices - some animations don't translate well to touch
Keep btnText concise (1-3 words). Long text wraps awkwardly on mobile.
Use styleType: 'style-1' for professional/corporate, 'style-3' for modern/creative
Vertical icons (icnVrtcal: 'icon-top') work best with short text (1-2 words)
Test color contrast on button backgrounds - ensure WCAG AA compliance (4.5:1 minimum)
For download buttons: use download icon (fa-download) with target: '_blank'

layoutContext.parentBlocks: Can be used in any container (tp-container, tp-row/tp-column, tp-container-inner)
layoutContext.siblingBlocks: Often paired with tp-heading, tp-pro-paragraph for complete call-to-action sections
layoutContext.alignmentBehavior: Alignment applies to wrapper div, button inherits alignment (text-align on parent)
layoutContext.responsiveStrategy: Alignment, iconSize, iconSpace all support responsive (md/sm/xs) breakpoints

performanceConsiderations: Hover animations (btnHvrType, iconHvrType) are CSS-based - minimal performance impact
FancyBox (lightbox) loads additional JavaScript - slight page load overhead
Custom image icons require image loading - use optimized small images (64x64px recommended)
Multiple buttons with complex hover effects (style-3, style-6) can impact animation performance
Font Awesome icons load from icon font - ensure font is loaded for icons to appear
accessibilityNotes: CRITICAL: Icon-only buttons (empty btnText) MUST have ariaLabel describing button action
ariaLabel examples: 'Play video', 'Download PDF', 'Call us', 'View shopping cart'
Ensure button has sufficient color contrast against background (WCAG AA: 3:1 minimum for large text)
Minimum button size on mobile: 44x44px for touch targets (WCAG guideline)
External links (target: '_blank') should indicate 'opens in new tab' in ariaLabel
Icon-only buttons should have visible focus state for keyboard navigation
Don't rely on color alone to convey meaning - use icons and text together
Test with screen readers - button should announce clearly with purpose and destination
